name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A basic course introducing students to the fundamentals of computer science, such as algorithms, data structures, and programming paradigms.

name: Computer Networking and Data Communications
description: An introduction to computer networking, data communications, and related topics, such as network architectures, protocols, and models.

name: Network Security and Cryptography
description: A course exploring the fundamentals of network security and cryptography, such as encryption and authentication techniques.

name: Advanced Networking and Data Communications
description: An advanced course exploring more advanced concepts in computer networking and data communications, such as routing, congestion control, and network performance.

name: Computer Network Programming
description: A course focusing on programming for computer networks, such as socket programming and protocols.
